titles.title: Shawnee Wilderness Designation Act
Shawnee Wilderness Designation Act
A bill to designate as wilderness certain National Forest System land in the State of Illinois, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary:
Shawnee Wilderness Designation Act
This bill designates approximately 289,000 acres of Forest Service land comprising the Shawnee National Forest in Illinois as the Shawnee Wilderness and as a component of the National Wilderness Preservation System.
